abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 140   INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN CAROL HOWARD An ordinance repealing Ordinance 70025  and in lieu thereof enacting a new ordinance prohibiting the issuance of any package liquor licenses for any currently non-licensed premises within the boundaries of the Fourteenth Ward Liquor Control District, as established herein, for a period of three years from the effective date hereof; containing an exception allowing, during the moratorium period, for the transfer and renewal of existing licenses, under certain circumstances, and the issuance of a drink license at previously non-licensed premises; and containing an emergency clause.
